HttpProxyFactory - Class in com.quorum.tessera.socket
Creates proxies to the local HTTP server, setting up connection configuration such as the target address and SSL settings.

R

read() - Method in class com.quorum.tessera.socket.UnixDomainServerSocket
Read HTTP request from the socket
run() - Method in class com.quorum.tessera.socket.SocketHandler
Deals with a server request by reading all the bytes from the request, establishing an HTTP connection to the local server, and writing the bytes.
run() - Method in class com.quorum.tessera.socket.SocketServer
Wait for a client connection, then: - create a connection to the HTTP server - read the client HTTP request and forward it to the HTTP server - read the HTTP response and return it to the client Note that Quorum opens a new client connection for each request.

S

sendRequest(byte[]) - Method in class com.quorum.tessera.socket.HttpProxy
Write data to the http connection.
SocketHandler - Class in com.quorum.tessera.socket
Handles a single request from the Unix Socket Run asynchronously to allow the socket server to listen for other connections whilst this request is being dealt with.
SocketHandler(UnixDomainServerSocket, HttpProxyFactory) - Constructor for class com.quorum.tessera.socket.SocketHandler
 
SocketServer - Class in com.quorum.tessera.socket
Create a server listening on a Unix Domain Socket for http requests.
SocketServer(Path, HttpProxyFactory, ExecutorService, UnixSocketFactory) - Constructor for class com.quorum.tessera.socket.SocketServer
Create the unix domain socket and start the listener thread.
SocketServerFactory - Interface in com.quorum.tessera.socket
A factory for creating server sockets based on the provided configuration

T

U
